address1.description: the first address line of the library

address2.description: the second address line of the library

address3.description: the third address line of the library

city.description: the city or province of the library

email.description: the primary email address of the library

fax.description: the fax number of the library

illemail.description: the ILL staff email address of the library

ip.description: the IP address for your library or branch

marc_org_code.description: MARC Organization Code, see http://www.loc.gov/marc/organizations/orgshome.html, when empty defaults to syspref MARCOrgCode

needs_override.description: If the library needs an override to act as pickup location for a hold

notes.description: notes related to your library or branch

phone.description: the primary phone of the library

pickup_location.description: If the library can act as a pickup location

postal_code.description: the postal code of the library

public.description: If the library is visible to the public

reply_to_email.description: the email to be used as a Reply-To

return_path_email.description: the email to be used as Return-Path

state.description: the reqional state of the library

url.description: the URL for your library or branch's website
